docs.snippet: The bil to charter the New-York Observalory was ordered to a third reading. The Grinding Committee put forward several bills, among them the New-York Western Dispensary bill. A large number of reports were presented by the various Committees, but...
docs.lead_paragraph: The bil to charter the New-York Observalory was ordered to a third reading. The Grinding Committee put forward several bills, among them the New-York Western Dispensary bill. A large number of reports were presented by the various Committees, but none of general interest. The bill to protect the liberty of witnesses was taken up in Committee of the Whole.

headline.main: AFFAIRS AT ALBANY.; A Health Officer and Marine Hospital Physician Nominated--List of the Candidates for the First Prize--The City Reform Bill, Atlantic Tunnel Removal and the Brooklyn Water and Sewerage Bills Ground and Ready to be Reported Complete.

docs.snippet: The columns of the New-York Times, this morning, contain intelligence of extraordinary moment from almost every quarter of the globe. By the arrival of the Persia, the Kangaroo and of the Niagara at Boston we are furnished with details of European...
docs.lead_paragraph: The columns of the New-York Times, this morning, contain intelligence of extraordinary moment from almost every quarter of the globe. By the arrival of the Persia, the Kangaroo and of the Niagara at Boston we are furnished with details of European intelligence for nine days ending upon March 19, with later news from India and China.

headline.main: NEWS BY TELEGRAPH.; Mexican Affairs--Secret Treaty Between Miramon and Sardinia--Three Mexican States to be Sold--The Cass-Yrisarri Treaty, &c. FROM WASHINGTON.

docs.lead_paragraph: Private letters from a highly responsible source have been received here from Mexico, giving the details of a secret treaty between MIRAMON and the Government of Sardinia, by which the former grants to Sardinia the States of Tabasco, Tehuantepec and Chiapa, (or five millions of dollars-France advancing one million, and guaranteeing the payment of the balance. Sardinia is to send out emigrants,

docs.snippet: Tile bills chartering the South Pacific American Mail Steamship Company; authorizing the American Express Company to sell certain real estate; to incorporate the New-York Observatory Association, and to increase the rates of publication of legal...
docs.lead_paragraph: Tile bills chartering the South Pacific American Mail Steamship Company; authorizing the American Express Company to sell certain real estate; to incorporate the New-York Observatory Association, and to increase the rates of publication of legal notices, were ordered to a third reading.

docs.snippet: The mails from the Isthmus, Western Coast of South America and North Pacific, brought by the Illinois from Aspinwall, March 19, and transferred to the Granada, at Havana, in consequence of an accident to the former steamer, arrived in this City...
docs.lead_paragraph: The mails from the Isthmus, Western Coast of South America and North Pacific, brought by the Illinois from Aspinwall, March 19, and transferred to the Granada, at Havana, in consequence of an accident to the former steamer, arrived in this City yesterday, in the afternoon.

docs.snippet: The mail steamship Granada, Lieut. 0. H. BERRYMAN, U. S. N., Commander, arrived at this port yesterday, bringing the mails received from the Illinois, disabled at Havana. We are thus furnished with highly interesting intelligence from the Western...

headline.main: THE ISTHMUS MAILS.; The Eruption of Mauna Loa, in the Sandwich Islands. The State of Negotiations in Nicaragua. Later from California, Oregon and British Columbia. THE REVOLUTION IN CHILI. Later and Important from South America. INTERESTING FROM CENTRAL AMERICA.

docs.lead_paragraph: The mail steamship Granada, Lieut. 0. H. BERRYMAN, U. S. N., Commander, arrived at this port yesterday, bringing the mails received from the Illinois, disabled at Havana. We are thus furnished with highly interesting intelligence from the Western Coast of South America, from New-Granada, Central America, California, and the Northern Pacific Ocean.

docs.snippet: The Legislature of this island are engaged at present in revising the tariff, and some of the changes made will interest those of your readers who are engaged in West India commerce. The mostimportant reduction is that in the duty on codfish, from...

headline.main: FROM BARBADOES.; Legislative Modification of the Tariff--Departure of Governor Hincks--Prospects of the Sugar Crop, &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Legislature of this island are engaged at present in revising the tariff, and some of the changes made will interest those of your readers who are engaged in West India commerce. The mostimportant reduction is that in the duty on codfish, from eight to four cents the quintal.

docs.snippet: The reselutions respecting the reduction of canal tolls, being the special order, were discussed and postponed till Wednesday. Several bills of no general interest were passed. The bill restricting costs in actions brought by Mutual Insurance...
docs.lead_paragraph: The reselutions respecting the reduction of canal tolls, being the special order, were discussed and postponed till Wednesday. Several bills of no general interest were passed. The bill restricting costs in actions brought by Mutual Insurance Companies came up for its third reading. On motion it was recommitted in order to make it entirely prohibit such actions in the case of bankrupt companies.
